entries.title: I've finally found a way to get the crispiest air fryer potato wedges
entries.description: The key to making these crispy yet fluffy air fryer potato wedges is to soak them in an ice bath.

entries.title: OnePlus Pad image leak gives us a better look at the upcoming tablet
entries.description: Get another sneak preview of what the OnePlus Pad looks like ahead of the tablet's official unveiling on Tuesday.

entries.title: How Disney’s Dreamlight Valley Made Me Feel Like A Kid Again
entries.description: Dreamlight Valley was the surprise hit of 2022, but it also reminded me of how Disney games used to be on PC.

entries.title: The company behind DeepTomCruise is bringing its de-aging tech to Hollywood
entries.description: Metaphysic has announced plans to bring its de-aging technology to Hollywood.

entries.title: Battery leak reveals more about Samsung's new XR headset
entries.description: A newly spotted battery could be intended for the Extended Reality device that Samsung is working on.

entries.title: Your smart speaker could be listening to more than you think
entries.description: Your smart speaker is listening to you, and it’s not just the manufacturer - find out about the other risks you face.
